item.title: 'My gran was last woman to be hanged in Britain – it set off horrific turn of events'
item.description: After Ruth Ellis became the last British woman to face the death penalty, a grim legacy of trauma and loss cascaded through her family

item.title: Cancer ‘Eureka moment’ as scientists discover how aspirin may prevent some tumours spreading
item.description: Cambridge University researchers show how aspirin could boost T-cells which stop cancers cells from spreading

item.title: Molly-Mae Hague's £18 bronzer she 'can't go without' gives 'instant summer glow'
item.description: The ITV star is known for her 'glowing', tanned skin - and now she's revealed the hero product she uses to achieve it, as well as her favourite blush

item.title: Nine students found dismembered with 'bag of hands' on Mexico holiday also 'tortured'
item.description: The bodies of the four women and five men, aged 19 to 30 and all from the town of Tlaxcala, were found in the boot of an abandoned car on a rural road...

item.title: Warning over 'dying' dog breed with less than 1,000 left
item.description: A woman has taken to social media to showcase the rare breed of dog she owns, which she says is a 'dying' breed
